SourceProxy.name: IsotropicRemeshingFilter
SourceProxy.label: CGAL Isotropic Remeshing
SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter will remesh the given data set. It takes a PolyData as input, and returns a PolyData containing the remeshed input. An optional input array can be supplied to mask the remeshing zone.

StringVectorProperty.name: MeshingMaskArrayName
StringVectorProperty.label: Meshing Mask
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Specifies the meshing mask array name.

IntVectorProperty.name: ProtectConstraints
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggles border constraints protection. The boundary edges will be considered as constrained and protected.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TargetEdgeLength
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The target length for the new edges of the mesh (default is 1% of the bounding box diagonal).

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfIterations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The number of iterations for the sequence of atomic operations performed (edge splits, edge collapses, edge flips, tangential relaxation and projection to the initial surface to generate a smooth mesh with a prescribed edge length).
